title: General Assembly
poster: C:/Users/Chris/Desktop/College Files/3rd Year files/Desktop Application Development/Projects/Semestral Project - CISC Virtual Hub/pics/generalassembly.jpg
content: The College of Information Sciences and Computing Student Council invites all students to the annual General Assembly! This marks the start of another academic year full of opportunities and collaboration.
details: Join us as we welcome new members of the CISC community and present the exciting line-up of events for the semester.
3. Introduction to House System and Points
4. Overview of upcoming events and competitions
Let’s start the year informed, united, and inspired!

title: College Assembly
poster: C:/Users/Chris/Desktop/College Files/3rd Year files/Desktop Application Development/Projects/Semestral Project - CISC Virtual Hub/pics/collegeassembly.png
content: The College Assembly serves as a platform for open communication between students, faculty, and administration.
details: This event aims to address student concerns, present academic updates, and strengthen collaboration within the college.
Your voice matters—attend and be heard!

title: Valorant
poster: C:/Users/Chris/Desktop/College Files/3rd Year files/Desktop Application Development/Projects/Semestral Project - CISC Virtual Hub/pics/valorant.png
content: Lock in your agents and get ready for battle! The CISC E-Sports Committee proudly presents the Valorant Tournament 2025.
details: Compete for glory and points for your house in this fast-paced 5v5 shooter.
1. Each team must consist of 5 players (same house).
2. Standard tournament format: Best of 3 per round.
Top teams will receive medals, points, and prizes!

title: Dota 2
poster: C:/Users/Chris/Desktop/College Files/3rd Year files/Desktop Application Development/Projects/Semestral Project - CISC Virtual Hub/pics/dota2.png
content: Prepare for another round of thrilling e-sports competition — the CISC Dota 2 Tournament 2025!
details: Teams will battle it out in the classic 5v5 Dota 2 format to earn points for their respective houses.
1. Best of 1 elimination; finals are Best of 3.
2. Teams must use official student accounts.
3. No pausing except for technical issues.
Who will dominate the lanes this year? Let’s find out!

title: Mobile Legends: Bang Bang
poster: C:/Users/Chris/Desktop/College Files/3rd Year files/Desktop Application Development/Projects/Semestral Project - CISC Virtual Hub/pics/mlbb.png
content: CISC’s favorite mobile tournament returns! Assemble your team and join the Mobile Legends: Bang Bang showdown.
details: Each team represents their house in a thrilling 5v5 match to earn valuable house points.
1. Each team must be composed of CISC students.
Let’s see who will take the title of CISC’s strongest ML team!

title: Volleyball
poster: C:/Users/Chris/Desktop/College Files/3rd Year files/Desktop Application Development/Projects/Semestral Project - CISC Virtual Hub/pics/volleyball.png
content: Get ready to spike, serve, and score! The CISC Intramural Volleyball Tournament is here.
details: Cheer for your house as they compete in this exciting sporting event filled with energy and teamwork.
1. Each house must field a minimum of 6 players.
Who will be crowned the CISC Volleyball Champions?

title: Bayanihan 2025 – 1st Session
poster: C:/Users/Chris/Desktop/College Files/3rd Year files/Desktop Application Development/Projects/Semestral Project - CISC Virtual Hub/pics/Bayanihan pic.jpg
C:/Users/Chris/Desktop/College Files/3rd Year files/Desktop Application Development/Projects/Semestral Project - CISC Virtual Hub/pics/areas.jpg
content: In preparation for the upcoming AACCUP Accreditation, the College of Information Sciences and Computing is calling all houses to unite for our Bayanihan Cleanup Drive!
details: 1. Points will be awarded based on attendance, cleanliness of your assigned area after the activity, and completeness of cleaning equipment brought.
2. The house with the most attendees, well-maintained cleaning area, and complete tools will earn the highest points!
3. These points will contribute to your overall house standings for future competitions and events.
4. Please bring your own cleaning equipment (broom, dustpan, mop, trash bags, etc.) — this will also be checked and counted for points.
Let’s work together, make our college shine, and show the Bayanihan spirit at its best!
